{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|彳|育|攵|liushu=p|t3=hand}} – originally a hand breaking a pot.

Pot figure similar to earlier forms of {{zh-l|*鬲}}, replaced/simplified in large seal script to {{zh-l|*育}} (earlier {{zh-l|*㐬}}) – a child with head down, and hair/lines going down.
